tool_description: Supercharge your projects with our game-changing API! Access nutritional insights for 50k+ foods in six languages, and sculpt the data according to your project's unique needs. Elevate your creations and enhance user experiences effortlessly!
name: Nutritional Data
title: Nutritional Data

api_list.name: Get Nutritional Data
api_list.description: Get nutritional values for over 50k foods in 6 different languages through a powerful API that let's you filter the data as you wish.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Limits the number of results. It should be a value between 0 and 100. The default value is 10.

optional_parameters.name: skip
optional_parameters.description: Skip the first N results. It should be a value bigger or equal to 0. The default value is 0
